create_command_db: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS command (create_date TEXT, job_id NOT NULL, task INTEGER NOT NULL, root_path TEXT, mode TEXT, status INTEGER, result_id INTEGER, result_msg TEXT, terminate INTEGER)
create_log_db: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS log (no INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, detail BLOB)
create_calib_history: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS calib_history (create_date TEXT, job_id INTEGER NOT NULL, event_id TEXT, root_path TEXT, cameras INTEGER, event_type TEXT, repro_err REAL)
